title: Pixel 3 RMA RMA02442104 -No Update- No phone
content:
Pixel 3 wouldn't recognise or charge with fast charger provided
Pixel 3 began suffering huge battery drain - (Sitting idle for 20 mins 99-70% drop)
Numerous factory resets & installs
Numerous chats to fix- RMA ordered- 5-10 day repair process promised
Phone collected 15 Days ago
Numerous chats during return period- Please wait for further updates

Day 12- No update on phone returned- no device issues

Google response- Please wait for further updates- No reason- No explanation

Does anyone have any idea how this can be moved along?
